Title: The Gift (2)
Plot: Sarah Jane faces the battle of her life to save her son from the effects of the gift of the Blathereen. Meanwhile trapped in the school, Rani, Clyde and K-9 fight to find a way to get to the attic, where the final showdown will take place.
GuestStars: Calvin Dean, Simon Callow, Miriam Margolyes, Paul Kasey, Ruari Mears, Jimmy Vee, Edward Judge, Sarah Paul, Nick Williams
